titleStmt.title: A short relation of the state of the Kirk of Scotland since the reformation of religion, to the present time for information, and advertisement to our brethren in the Kirk of England, by an hearty well-wisher to both kingdomes.
titleStmt.author: Warriston, Archibald Johnston, Lord, 1611-1663.

notesStmt.note: An hearty well-wisher to both kingdomes = Archibald Johnston, Lord Warriston.
Erroneously attributed to James Melville and to John Leslie, Earl of Rothes.
Running title reads: A short relation of the estate of the kirk of Scotland.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
